item.title: About to Sew
item.description: Got a great deal on a used sewing maching at the thrift shop. Gonna put that thing to work and start sewing all kinds of stuff. I’m gonna sew: Clothes for me Clothes for my kids Clothes for my girlfriend ;-) Stuffed animals Ultralight hiking gear I’ll probably start sewing anything I can get my hands on. Protect ya fabrics Sew4Life Sewin4eeva
